name: Proton Pilferer Vs The Particle Police
name_original: Proton Pilferer Vs The Particle Police
description:
In this radioactive, race against the clock, Proton Pilferer is carrying the stolen goods from his latest heist, a valuable bag of protons which he plans to fence on the black market.

Unfortunately for him, he happens to be made of Volatilium, which as we all know, is radioactive and becomes incredibly unstable with excess charge.

Help him stash his loot in his special proton-storage container, before he shrinks himself out of existence from radioactive decay. All while avoiding the Particle police, hot on his trail.

My 1st gamejam submission. Made for Ludum Dare 49.

All audio used is under the CC0 creative commons license, everything else was done by me from scratch.

Software:

- Unity 2020.3.19f1

- Aseprite v1.2.29

- Pyxel edit v0.4.9
